paper_abstract: In this paper, we propose an analytical solution to a nonlinear second-order boundary value problem using the Homotopy Perturbation Method (HPM) and the 4q-Boubaker Polynomials Expansion Scheme (BPES). Both methods have been applied to a particular differential problem. The results are plotted, and compared with exact solutions proposed elsewhere, in order to evaluate accuracy. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: The Comparative Boubaker Polynomials Expansion Scheme (BPES) and Homotopy Perturbation Method (HPM) for solving a standard nonlinear second-order boundary value problem
